item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo Compartment Smoke Detection System Detectors (Forward, Aft) – Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System

remarks.para: Multiple detectors within a smoke zone(s) (Forward and/or Aft) may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: All inoperative detectors per smoke zone are of the same loop type (loop A or B), and
All detectors of opposite loop type are verified to be operative before each departure.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Prior to each departure, verify the remaining smoke detector(s) are operative:
Push and hold the flight deck FIRE/OVHT TEST button on the overhead panel.
Verify proper system indications followed by EICAS FIRE TEST PASS message accompanied by the status message associated with the inoperative smoke detection loop(s).

placard.para: Install Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel "LOOP (A or B) LOWER LOBE CARGO DECK SMOKE DETECTORS IN (FWD or AFT) PIT INOP". Enter item inAircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)
